homepage.title: Home
homepage.description: Experienced, innovative and proactive Front-end Developer with strong expertise in building dynamic, scalable websites and applications. Skilled in delivering elegant and user-focused digital solutions.

skills.html_css: HTML5 and CSS3 for creating semantic, accessible, and visually appealing web pages with responsive design principles.)

skills.ui_ux: UI/UX design principles to create intuitive and engaging user interfaces that enhance user experience and satisfaction.
